item.title: Flashing Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge SM-G935FD
item.author: Alan Cortez
item.description: Flashing Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge SM-G935FD Requirements: Samsung USB Drivers Odin3 V3.13 TWRP Files for SD Card Magisk No-verity-opt-encrypt RMM-State-Bypass Samsung Anti Root Removal Procedure Install drivers on computer. On phone: Enable Developer Options Enable USB Debugging OEM Unlock Open Odin Untick Auto Reboot AP –> Select TWRP Start phone in Download Mode (Vol Down + Menu + Power Button) Start Restart phone in Recovery Mode (Vol up + Menu + Power Button) Wipe –> Wipe Data Copy Files from SD Card Folder to Phone From TWRP Install in this order: No-verity-opt-encrypt RMM-State-Bypass Magisk Samsung Anti Root Removal Reboot –> System –> Don’t install Update Magisk from official site.
